string.value: You're a Magician! Yay! Er, now what? Ah, maybe you should talk to #b#p1032001##k.
#p1032001# suggests that you hunt monsters as your basic training. Take care of #r8 #o0210100#s#k. You can find #o0210100#s right around #m101000000#. \n\n#o0210100# #r#a21321##k
You took care of 8 #o0210100#s and reported the news to #p1032001#. Quite easy, actually.

이보게, 젊은 마법사. 마법사가 된지 얼마 되지 않아 어려운 점이 많겠군. 마법사가 되었다고 해도 아직은 모르는 것이 더 많은 데다가 스스로의 힘으로 사냥하는 것도 어렵고... 아닌가? 어떤가? 이 하인즈가 자네의 수련을 도와주어도 되겠는가?
#L0# #b수련을 하겠습니다.#l 

#L1# 스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있습니다. #I
더 큰 성장을 위해 스스로의 한계를 인정하는 건 좋은 자세이지. 좋아. 자네에게 수련을 시켜주지.
스스로의 힘으로 할 수 있다니, 그거 참 기특하군... 하지만 혼자서 수련하기란 쉽지 않을 걸세... 자네의 힘만으로 어려워진다면 언제든 찾아오게.

Hey, young Magician. You have many problems as a beginner. You don't know much even though you became a Magician. I guess you find it hard to hunt. Am I right? Do you mind if #p1032001# helps you with training?
#L0# #bI will train.#l 

#L1# I can do it by myself #I
If you can accept your limit, you are more likely to grow up. Good. I will teach how to train yourself.
It's good that you can train by yourself. It'll be hard. If you can't do it by yourself, come to me anytime.
You're too weak to compete with strong monsters. First, you had better learn how to hunt. If you hunt eight #r#o0210100#s#k, you'll master basic skills. #o0210100#s live around #m101000000#.
You're not ready to be trained.
Oh~ You killed eight #o0210100# . Much faster than I expected. Wonderful. Fantastic.
But, you can't be happy with this. Until we meet again...keep training hard!
Haven't you eliminated #r8 #o0210100##k yet? Try harder!
